content.question: Answer all parts of the question that follows.identify ONE way in which Enlightenment ideas changed political thought in Europe in the period after 1750.Explain ONE way in which Enlightenment ideas represent a continuity with previous patterns of social thought in global history.Explain ONE way in which Enlightenment ideas influenced political ideologies in Latin America, Asia, or Africa in the period circa 1800–2000.

frqParts.text: Answer all parts of the question that follows.identify ONE way in which Enlightenment ideas changed political thought in Europe in the period after 1750.Explain ONE way in which Enlightenment ideas represent a continuity with previous patterns of social thought in global history.Explain ONE way in which Enlightenment ideas influenced political ideologies in Latin America, Asia, or Africa in the period circa 1800–2000.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
